price: 71. Et s’ils entendent te trahir, (sache qu’) ils ont trahi Allah auparavant, Qui vous les a déjà livrés. Allah est Omniscient et Sage.
arabic: وَإِن يُرِيدُواْ خِيَانَتَكَ فَقَدۡ خَانُواْ ٱللَّهَ مِن قَبۡلُ فَأَمۡكَنَ مِنۡهُمۡۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-in yurīdū khiyānataka faqad khānū al-laha min qablu fa-amkana min'hum wal-lahu ʿalīmun ḥakīmun
